verses.verse: וַֽיִּגְּשׁ֗וּ <S%H5066><s%> vai-yig-ge-Shu, Then came near רָאשֵׁי֙ <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shei the heads אֲב֣וֹת <S%H1><s%> a-Vot of the fathers הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> hal-vi-Yim, of the Levites אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about אֶלְעָזָר֙ <S%H499><s%> 'el-'a-Zar unto Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen, the priest וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' and unto Joshua בִּן־ <S%H1121><s%> bin- the son נ֑וּן <S%H5126><s%> Nun; of Nun וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and to רָאשֵׁ֛י <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shei and unto the heads אֲב֥וֹת <S%H1><s%> a-Vot of the fathers הַמַּטּ֖וֹת <S%H4294><s%> ham-mat-Tot of the tribes לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וַיְדַבְּר֨וּ <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-be-Ru And they spake אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem to בְּשִׁלֹ֗ה <S%H7887><s%> be-shi-Loh, unto them at Shiloh בְּאֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land כְּנַ֙עַן֙ <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an of Canaan לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD צִוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah commanded בְיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> ve-yad- by the hand מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, of Moses לָֽתֶת־ <S%H5414><s%> la-tet- to give לָ֥נוּ La-nu עָרִ֖ים <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rim us cities לָשָׁ֑בֶת <S%H3427><s%> la-Sha-vet; to dwell in וּמִגְרְשֵׁיהֶ֖ן <S%H4054><s%> u-mig-re-shei-Hen with the suburbs לִבְהֶמְתֵּֽנוּ׃ <S%H929><s%> liv-hem-Te-nu. thereof for our cattle

וַיִּתְּנ֨וּ <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-te-Nu gave בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֧ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לַלְוִיִּ֛ם <S%H3881><s%> lal-vi-Yim unto the Levites מִנַּחֲלָתָ֖ם <S%H5159><s%> min-na-cha-la-Tam out of their inheritance אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- according פִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> pi at the commandment יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הֶעָרִ֥ים <S%H5892><s%> he-'a-Rim these cities הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh these וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מִגְרְשֵׁיהֶֽן׃ <S%H4054><s%> mig-re-shei-Hen. and their suburbs

וַיֵּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze came out הַגּוֹרָ֖ל <S%H1486><s%> hag-go-Ral And the lot לְמִשְׁפְּחֹ֣ת <S%H4940><s%> le-mish-pe-Chot for the families הַקְּהָתִ֑י <S%H6956><s%> hak-ke-ha-Ti; of the Kohathites וַיְהִ֡י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi received לִבְנֵי֩ <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei and the children אַהֲרֹ֨ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron of Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen the priest מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- were of הַלְוִיִּ֗ם <S%H3881><s%> hal-vi-Yim, [which were] of the Levites מִמַּטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> mi-mat-Teh out of the tribe יְ֠הוּדָה <S%H3063><s%> Ye-hu-dah of Judah וּמִמַּטֵּ֨ה <S%H4294><s%> u-mi-mat-Teh and out of the tribe הַשִּׁמְעֹנִ֜י <S%H8099><s%> hash-shim-'o-Ni of Simeon וּמִמַּטֵּ֤ה <S%H4294><s%> u-mi-mat-Teh and out of the tribe בִנְיָמִן֙ <S%H1144><s%> vin-ya-Min of Benjamin בַּגּוֹרָ֔ל <S%H1486><s%> bag-go-Ral, had by lot עָרִ֖ים <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rim cities שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> she-Losh three עֶשְׂרֵֽה׃ <S%H6240><s%> 'es-Reh. ten ס sa-Mek

וְלִבְנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> ve-liv-Nei of the children קְהָ֜ת <S%H6955><s%> ke-Hat of Kohath הַנּוֹתָרִ֗ים <S%H3498><s%> han-no-ta-Rim, And the rest מִמִּשְׁפְּחֹ֣ת <S%H4940><s%> mi-mish-pe-Chot out of the families מַטֵּֽה־ <S%H4294><s%> mat-teh- of the tribe אֶ֠פְרַיִם <S%H669><s%> 'Ef-ra-yim of Ephraim וּֽמִמַּטֵּה־ <S%H4294><s%> u-mi-mat-teh- and out of the tribe דָ֞ן <S%H1835><s%> dan of Dan וּמֵחֲצִ֨י <S%H2677><s%> u-me-cha-Tzi and out of the half מַטֵּ֧ה <S%H4294><s%> mat-Teh tribe מְנַשֶּׁ֛ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh of Manasseh בַּגּוֹרָ֖ל <S%H1486><s%> bag-go-Ral [had] by lot עָרִ֥ים <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rim cities עָֽשֶׂר׃ <S%H6235><s%> 'A-ser. ten ס sa-Mek

וְלִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> ve-liv-Nei And the children גֵרְשׁ֗וֹן <S%H1648><s%> ge-re-Shon, of Gershon מִמִּשְׁפְּח֣וֹת <S%H4940><s%> mi-mish-pe-Chot out of the families מַטֵּֽה־ <S%H4294><s%> mat-teh- of the tribe יִשָּׂשכָ֣ר <S%H3485><s%> yis-so-sh-Char of Issachar וּמִמַּטֵּֽה־ <S%H4294><s%> u-mi-mat-teh- and out of the tribe אָ֠שֵׁר <S%H836><s%> 'a-Sher of Asher וּמִמַּטֵּ֨ה <S%H4294><s%> u-mi-mat-Teh and out of the tribe נַפְתָּלִ֜י <S%H5321><s%> naf-ta-Li of Naphtali וּ֠מֵחֲצִי <S%H2677><s%> U-me-cha-tzi and out of the half מַטֵּ֨ה <S%H4294><s%> mat-Teh tribe מְנַשֶּׁ֤ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh of Manasseh בַבָּשָׁן֙ <S%H1316><s%> vab-ba-Shan in Bashan בַּגּוֹרָ֔ל <S%H1486><s%> bag-go-Ral, [had] by lot עָרִ֖ים <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rim cities שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> she-Losh three עֶשְׂרֵֽה׃ <S%H6240><s%> 'es-Reh. ten ס sa-Mek

לִבְנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei The children מְרָרִ֜י <S%H4847><s%> me-ra-Ri of Merari לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֗ם <S%H4940><s%> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam, by their families מִמַּטֵּ֨ה <S%H4294><s%> mi-mat-Teh [had] out of the tribe רְאוּבֵ֤ן <S%H7205><s%> re-'u-Ven of Reuben וּמִמַּטֵּה־ <S%H4294><s%> u-mi-mat-teh- and out of the tribe גָד֙ <S%H1410><s%> gad of Gad וּמִמַּטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> u-mi-mat-Teh and out of the tribe זְבוּלֻ֔ן <S%H2074><s%> ze-vu-Lun, of Zebulun עָרִ֖ים <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rim cities שְׁתֵּ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> she-Teim both עֶשְׂרֵֽה׃ <S%H6240><s%> 'es-Reh. ten

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et שְׂדֵ֥ה <S%H7704><s%> se-Deh But the fields הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir of the city וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et חֲצֵרֶ֑יהָ <S%H2691><s%> cha-tze-Rei-ha; and the villages נָֽתְנ֛וּ <S%H5414><s%> na-te-Nu thereof gave לְכָלֵ֥ב <S%H3612><s%> le-cha-Lev they to Caleb בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יְפֻנֶּ֖ה <S%H3312><s%> ye-fun-Neh of Jephunneh בַּאֲחֻזָּתֽוֹ׃ <S%H272><s%> ba-'a-chuz-za-To. for his possession ס sa-Mek
